Но я прошел эту игру за то время, на которое надеялись вентили, ибо я рукожоп, и пройти игру( а тем более шутер) отнимет у меня много времени. Особенно момент со стрйдером и штурмовиком.И это без ачивок! С ачивками я бы там на полдня застрял. Так что не надо говорить что с ачивками вы и часа-двух пройти не успели, что игра короткая. Тут уже у кого какой скилл. Максимальное время прохождения 5-7 часов. Дольше некуда

[h1]No aporta nada a la saga[/h1]
Si.... bueno... Half Life es un juego de culto, y bla, bla, bla... así que... ¿¿¿cómo vas a criticar nada relacionado con Half-Life???
Fácil. El Episodio 1 es una expasión que no aporta nada, y deja todas las preguntas del anterior sin responder.
La mayor parte de este juego se convierte en un juego de Zombies.
Lo único interesante es que tienes todo el rato a Alyx acompanándote, matando zombies contigo. Pero al final, no deja de ser más de lo mismo, quitándole toda la originalidad del primer juego y haciéndolo mucho más lineal.
Una expasión totalmente innecesaria.
Очень коротенькое продолжение шедевра от Валв. Всем доволен и всё было на высоте!

关卡设计比本体优秀了不少。
本体能让我有点感觉的只有莱温霍姆。而第一章的隧道/地下车库，微弱的光源，咆哮的尸群令人恐惧，与艾利克斯一起在医院拿着散弹枪大开杀戒真的让人血脉喷张。
当然，最后一关连续护送市民还是有点令人厌烦

A great follow up to the already titular Half Life 2. Was kind of short, but I really enjoyed every second of it. No new gameplay additions were made to the game, except separating the flashlight power source from sprinting power source.

Storywise, this game tries to answer some questions, but asks more as well. It was tightly written and well paced, plus the new iteration of graphics give it a new feel.
10 Striders out of 15 Headcrabs.

É impressionante que seja quase uma realidade alternativa no universo do Half Life, e uma ótima continuação muito bem desenvolvida em termos de jogabilidade e contação de história, você sente que é de fato half life de uma nova geração, apesar de jogar em 2021 o jogo continua incrivelmente realista, muito bem polido em termos de contexto e é bastante lindo. O universo respira ao seu redor e história está sempre lhe convidande a seguir em frente.
i - i -i its wike hawf wife buh- buh ehpissode won!!!!111!!!
Lysten til at spille netop dette dukker op et par gange om året ;) (alt hvad der er lavet til Half life spiller max)
olha..eu zerei o jogo original Half-Life 2, este jogo: Half-Life 2 Episode One é legal mais para mim, não supera o original MAAAAAAAAAAAAS é legal o jogo e recomendo

o que eu gostei:
-os momentos de ação que são muito bens feitos,com atmosfera sufocante e ameaçadora.
-a ambientação(você esta fugindo as pressas de uma cidade que esta desmoronando depois de uma revolução contra a raça alienígena combine,tudo esta desmoronando,quebrando e com o risco da cidadela explodir a qualquer momento).
-o desenvolvimento com a personagem alyx que foi bom no 2 , mas nesse foi muito mas aprofundado, você meio que passa o jogo inteiro com ela,você sente as emoções dela tanto pelos diálogos quanto pelas expressões faciais e isso numa expansão de um jogo de 2006 é fantástico.

o que eu não gostei:
obs: esses vão ser meus pontos de vista sobre o que eu não gostei,não quer dizer que a minha verdade é absoluta é só minha opinião.
-o tempo de jogo,pelo preço de 16 reais em um jogo que pode ser completado em 4 horas
-a história não é tão surpreendente,o núcleo da cidadela pode explodir a qualquer momento,e  vocês tem que fugir de o mais rápido possível(ou seja, nada muito ambicioso como nos outros jogos.)
 

Nota final:8.0

jogo excelente

Half Life 2 was amazing, and if you liked that then this will satisfy you. That's how it was for me, I was fine with this, and it was worth playing, but nothing special happened really. It was pretty short, only took me like 3 hours to beat, (I left it on overnight on accident) and I don't remember much about it other than it just being okay. Definitely skippable, and there is too much waiting around for Alyx.
if you are reading this review, you are bored and already own the game. if not, buy it already.
Kontynuacja przygody Freemana oraz Alyx z części Half Life 2. Wielkim + tego tytułu jest grafika, która i tak według mnie była w tamtych latach ponadczasowa. Po prostu świetna gra :)

The Entire Plot of star wars

This takes everything wrong with Half Life 2 and takes it to another level. It insults player's intelligence. Alyx comments on how terrible it is that Combine turned people into stalkers as if it isn't obvious, she says something along the lines of "Oh that's a zombie combine, it's a zombine", yeah this is a Gearbox game now. Another thing that bothered me is the revelation that Barney and Gordon would race to Dr. Kleiner's office when he would lock himself out through air ducts. Yeah, Barney who totally was in Black Mesa and Dr. Kleiner who also totally was in Black Mesa. God damn, adding "characters" to this game was one of the worst decisions ever made.
The one of the big problems is that you are locked out of your guns for majority of the episode. Gravity Gun overstayed its welcome anyways but basically the first hour of this just revolves around using it.
Now the biggest problem goes back to the previous issue: because you are locked out of your guns and you rarely get ammo when you get them back, Alyx does most of the shooting. This is basically a reverse escort mission and in case you were wondering if there was anything worse than escort missions in video games, this episode answers that.

The thing is this game isn't just a remaster, though it still stays true to Half-life 1, it comes into its own pretty early on in the game. For example, some levels have been completely redesigned, and some have been added entirely. Which brings me on to the fact that the game has added so much to what the original game was, which you can see really clearly in the Xen, where it feels like what the original half life was trying to achieve with it. 10/10 would recommend.

Although this is a separate game, the story continues right after the half life 2.  The game style is the same as half life 2.

One bullet achievement puts a constraint on the player which will totally change the game experience.

Valve with Episode One took on themself a titanic task. Someone thought "How do we turn a great game into an awful DLC for quick buck?" As people ahead of their time, they succeded. Episode One is a 3-hour standalone DLC loitered with design decisions so awful, that you ask yourself "Did they outsourced this to indian dev team?"  This time, instead of trying to immerse you through gameplay (that requires thought and work) you get REAL CINEMATIC EXPERIENCE™.  Prepare yourself for Alyx's constant remarks written by intern, consisting mostly of "Gordon! You have to turn this Valve™®  or Combine™® WINSSS". No new mechanics. One new enemy.  Half of the time you will run away from endlessly respawning zombies, having neither ammo or things to throw with Gravity Gun® ™ because that whats made original half life 2 fun right? 
Not Worth even 1$.
